remarks: Define set of all lattice dilations.  Similar to definition of dilation in [Crawley] p. 111.  (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.)
statement:
df-ldil $p |- LDil = ( k e. _V |-> ( w e. ( LHyp ` k ) |-> { f e. ( LAut ` k ) | A. x e. ( Base ` k ) ( x ( le ` k ) w -> ( f ` x ) = x ) } ) ) $.
$d f k w x $.
